title: 服务器权限问题！
author: fafalnq
txt_content: 自己想修改下group文件结果修改完了后什么命令都不能用了，包括Help，求人留邮箱然后我把Group和User文件发过去求修改。。

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content: 添加权限条目时候前面的空格也要留着，要不然会无法读取，具体什么原因，你用notepad++打开就明白了

replies.author: fafalnq
replies.txt_content:
zjy 发表于 2013-1-16 21:35 
你改了什么？
我把所有的代表回车的特殊字符改成了回车

replies.author: zjy
replies.txt_content:
fafalnq 发表于 2013-1-17 10:36 
我把所有的代表回车的特殊字符改成了回车
你到底有多无聊= =

replies.author: fafalnq
replies.txt_content:
zjy 发表于 2013-1-16 21:38 
你到底有多无聊= =
我有强迫症，看着一横排一横排的不舒服（你别水了）

replies.author: zjy
replies.txt_content:
fafalnq 发表于 2013-1-17 10:40 
我有强迫症，看着一横排一横排的不舒服（你别水了）
那我不知道怎么弄了。找别人吧

replies.author: fafalnq
replies.txt_content:
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    -bukkit.command.kill
    - mcjobs.jobs_children
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Player:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - mcjobs.jobs_children
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default

    - g:bukkit_default

    - g:essentials_default

    - g:towny_default
    inheritance:
    info:
      prefix: "&7[Player]&f"
      build: true
      suffix: ''
   Builder:
   default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    inheritance:
    info:
      prefix: "&2[Builder]&a"
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&9'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    info:
      prefix: "&4[Admin]&c"
      build: true
      suffix: ''
